title: [Self-Directed] Short-Term Intensive Course Applying Immediate Feedback E-Assessment for Foundational Mathematics Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of high-school-level basic mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: A foundational mathematics education course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields. A customized online learning environment conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology settings.

learning_goals: Learners can solve basic algebra and statistics problems with an accuracy rate of over 85%.
Learners can enhance their error analysis and correction skills by utilizing immediate feedback provided by e-assessment systems.
Learners can boost their self-efficacy by achieving over 90% of their weekly learning goals within a week.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
